fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.interfaces

Interface ManagementI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NodeServicesCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffusionNodePlugin, ElectionNodePlugin, NodeServicesConnector, NodeServicesInboundPort, NodeServicesOutboundPort, SRONNodePlugin

    public interface ManagementI
    The interface ManagementI declares the signatures of methods used to manage the ring overlay network.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectAsFirstNode()
      connect the current node as the first in the ring i.e., its node services outbound port is connected to its inbound port.
      void connectNextNode(java.lang.String nextRIPURI)
      connect the node component with the given reflection inbound port URI as the new next node in the ring.
      void connectToNewNext(java.lang.String newNextIBPURI)
      connect the outbound port of the current node component to the inbounbd port of the given URI.
      void disconnectNode()
      disconnect the node from the ring.

        void connectNextNode(java.lang.String nextRIPURI)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        connect the node component with the given reflection inbound port URI as the new next node in the ring.

        Contract

         pre     nextRIPURI != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nextRIPURI - reflection inbound port URI of non connected new node component.

        java.lang.Exception - to do.

        Contract

 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
